member.name: ID3D10SwitchToRef.GetUseRef
member.summary: Get a boolean value that indicates the type of device being used.
member.returns: TRUE if the device is a software device, FALSE if the device is a hardware device. See remarks.

member.name: ID3D10SwitchToRef.SetUseRef
member.summary: Switch between a hardware and a software device.
member.param: A boolean value. Set this to TRUE to change to a software device, set this to FALSE to change to a hardware device.

member.name: ID3D10SwitchToRef
member.summary: A switch-to-reference interface (see the switch-to-reference layer) enables an application to switch between a hardware and software device.
